data.text:
Nothing not to like! Hospitable staff,great location, good food, and lovely room.
I won’t be looking for any where else to stay when in Barcelona for a long weekend 
The shower was the best I have experienced in any of the hotels I have stayed in. The location is excellent for night and day. The  last time I was in Barcelona was 30 years ago, and I now know I hardly seen any of it back then. A smart phone (didn’t exist. Back then) and the location of the hotel changed all that!
Thanks Martin
data.title: Long weekend in Barcelona

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Martin

We are delighted that you have chosen our hotel and had such a positive experience. We work to make our customers happy, and our greatest satisfaction is knowing that we have achieved our goal. We hope to welcome you back to our hotels in the near future.

Best regards,
Anna R.
Customer Service
owner_response.author: Carmen M Customer Service

data.text:
We spent 4 nights here. Absolute fabulous hotel. Very well located. Brilliant staff from the front of house to Muriel in the bar. All very friendly and helpful. Rooms modern and clean. Breakfast lovely.
Would definitely stay here again. Brilliant for exploring Barcelona
data.title: Few days in Barcelona!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear glasshalffull2021
Thank you so much for sharing your experience! We're thrilled to hear that you had a fabulous stay with us and that you found our hotel to be well-located with modern and clean rooms. It's wonderful to know that our staff, especially Muriel, left a positive impression with their friendliness and helpfulness. We appreciate your kind words and recommendation, and we can't wait to welcome you back for another brilliant stay. 
Best regards
owner_response.author: Carmen M Customer Service

data.text: Really comfortable beds but bring ear plugs, there's noise from the street at weekends, though if you want to be in the heart of things....  A wonderful helpful reception team and a useful bar with sofas when you get back from an evening out.  Any hotel that offers bubbly for breakfast gets my vote!  I'd stay here again purely for the lovely service.
data.title: comfortable, friendly and central

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guide708680

Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback about your stay at our hotel. We're glad to hear that you found our central location comfortable and welcoming.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused by street noise. Next time you visit us, you can request an interior room where tranquility is guaranteed. We understand the importance of rest during your stay.

We're pleased that you found our reception team helpful and enjoyed the relaxed atmosphere of our bar after a night out. We strive to provide exceptional service to our guests, and your kind words mean a lot to us.

It's great to hear that you enjoyed our special touch of offering champagne for breakfast. We're delighted to have made a positive impression on you and look forward to welcoming you again in the future.

Sincerely,

Carmen M.
Customer Service
owner_response.author: Carmen M Customer Service

data.text: Horrible customer service. Old hotel in need of repair. The smell in the room was terrible and the noise from the street made the whole stay even worse. I asked for the hotel to accommodate a change in my reservation and they refused referring me to their non-refundable booking policies. Not a great location for the hotel. I recommend you stay elsewhere.
data.title: Terrible customer service experience and pretty old hotel in need of major repairs. The smell in the room was terrible.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Dear Sir/Madam, We are very surprised by your opinion, since our hotel retains the old façade but is completely updated inside and we have not recently heard of any complaints about odor, or request for a refund. By not indicating your reservation number or name and surname, we cannot address this comment from any other perspective since, as you know, the opinions are not verified. Receive kind regards, Norma A., Customer Service
owner_response.author: Norma A Customer Service

data.text:
Beautiful hotel that’s perfectly located. 

Metro stop nearby. 

Breakfast is plentiful and lots of choice for everyone. 

Rooms clean, spacious and beds really, really comfortable. 

My husband booked this hotel for my 50th birthday present & I was very impressed, especially as he had arranged a lovely bottle of Cava & chocolates for our arrival. 

Perfect hotel for a perfect break, would 100% recommend.
data.title: 50th birthday trip

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Dear Madam, Thank you very much for your kind review. We are excited to know that he had an excellent experience celebrating his 50th birthday at our hotel. His satisfaction is our goal, and we hope to welcome him again. Best regards, Norma A., Customer Service
owner_response.author: Norma A Customer Service
